document.docAuthor: Yang, Yu-Xia, Okushima, Yûichi & Yang, Xing-Ke
document.masterDocTitle: Synonym, new species and checklist of the genus Fissocantharis Pic from Taiwan (Coleoptera, Cantharidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Synonym, new species and checklist of the genus Fissocantharis Pic from Taiwan (Coleoptera, Cantharidae)

figureCitation.captionText: FIGURES 1 – 4. Fissocantharis formosana (Pic, 1910) and its synonyms habitus, dorsal view: 1. Type of Rhagonycha formosana Pic, 1910; 2. Type of Podabrus curvatipes Pic, 1922; 3. Holotype of Rhagonycha obscurioripes Pic, 1926; 4. Holotype of Micropodabrus simplicicornis Wittmer, 1993. 1, 2, 4. male; 3. female.

treatmentCitationGroup.paragraph:
Micropodabrus simplicicornis
Wittmer, 1993 : 209
, Abb. 9, 12 . syn. nov.

Remarks. The examination of type specimens shows that
Micropodabrus simplicicornis
Wittmer, 1993
is a junior synonym of
Fissocantharis formosana (
Pic, 1910
)
, since there is no difference between them in the characters of appearance and aedeagus. Besides, a large series of additional specimens available in this study appear that this species has some variation in the body coloration, e.g. head orange, sometimes darkened, antennae black, sometimes several basal antennomeres orange, legs entirely orange, sometimes tibiae and tarsi black or entirely black, but the aedeagus is conservative and dependable.
